title: Gen AI - Project 404
description: Project 404 is a full-stack, developer-focused chatbot built with modern web technologies. It features real-time conversations powered by OpenAI, user authentication with OAuth and Firebase Anonymous Auth, and persistent storage using MongoDB with Mongoose. The project showcases a dynamic and responsive single-page application (SPA) designed to highlight my frontend and backend development skills.

title: Advanced Automation Corporation - DLI Project 0018
description: This project is an e-Learning application to teach foreign language for Advanced Automation Corporation. This application is built using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS, and Bootstrap. Additional packages include but are not limited to Three.JS, Redux, React Router, Material-UI, and many others. The application is currently in progress.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Professional portfolio website built using Vite CLI, React, and TailwindCSS. As will all portfolio websites, this website is a showcase of my skills, projects, and experiences. All imagery not associated with a specific project is AI generated. The website is currently in continual development.

media.alt: To-do Application Home Page with To-do Item

title: To-do using Local Storage
description: Simple To-do application built using React.JS, and TailwindCSS. The application uses local storage to store the to-do items. React Router is used to navigate between pages and components. CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations are implemented through Actions and Loaders. Actions handle Create (C), Update (U), and Delete (D), the Loaders handle the Read (R) aspects of CRUD. The application is completed and deployed.

media.alt: To-do Application Home Page with To-do Item

title: Potowatomi Training LLC - Project 92F10
description: This project is an e-Learning application for Potowatomi Training LLC. The application is built using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. The focus of this application is Military Resupply Operations. The application is completed and deployed.

title: Potowatomi Training LLC - DLI Project 0045
description: This project is an e-Learning application to teach foreign language for Potowatomi Training LLC. The application is built using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. The application is completed and deployed.
